definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: I was having lunch with Galt at a French restaurant near her apartment in Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 我们在高特切尔西区公寓附近的法国餐馆吃饭。

sentences.english: Lyon claim that Chelsea's attempts to sign midfielder Michael Essien have all but collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 里昂宣称切尔西试图签下中场埃辛的事情以失败告终。

sentences.english: The Royals have taken Chelsea's England Under-21 left-back Bertrand on loan.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西的英格兰U21国脚伯特兰将通过租借加盟。

sentences.english: Chelsea coach Carlo Ancelotti is ready to show his hand for Milan midfielder Clarence Seedorf.
sentences.chinese: 最新报道显示，切尔西正寻求签下米兰的西多夫。

sentences.english: In the end, there was plenty for the Chelsea boss to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛结束后，切尔西的老板仍然举行了庆功会。

sentences.english: I saw the other day when Chelsea played against Leverkusen - it was not a sell-out.
sentences.chinese: 就在切尔西对阵勒沃库森的时候，球票就没有卖完。

sentences.english: Chelsea's win gives them a goal tally of 103 for the season - a Premier League record.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西单个赛季共进103个球，成为了英超新记录。

sentences.english: Many old players and Chelsea dignatories will attend.
sentences.chinese: 界时不少前切尔西球员和重要人物将会出席。

sentences.english: Hillary’s mother, Dorothy, and Chelsea were going with me to India.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里的母亲桃乐西和切尔西陪我一起去了印度。

sentences.english: Chelsea have signed Ballack and John Obi Mikel and there is competition.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西已经和布来克和迈克尔签了约，这就是竞争。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about Chelsea Market?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我们讲讲切尔西超市吗？

sentences.english: The Chelsea boss is also wary of the Toon Army effect.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西教练很警惕纽卡斯尔军团的影响。

sentences.english: He showed another string to his bow with a stunning goal at Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 他在对战切尔西的时候，也打入了一个漂亮的入球。

sentences.english: Chelseas Ginger is hanging in her room in Chappaqua today.
sentences.chinese: 《切尔西的生姜》现在仍然挂在她在查帕奎的房间里。

sentences.english: Khalid Boulahrouz receives his first call-up for Holland as a Chelsea player.
sentences.chinese: 布拉鲁兹在转会到切尔西以后第一次入选了国家队。

definition: Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
